title: Sweetest kill
description: Olivia Taylor has been loyal all her life. To her super religious and self righteous parents.To her older brother Jaxon, who drops out of high school when his crazy girlfriend gets pregnantWhen Olivia moves into her very first place. She is expecting to fall head over heels with the bad boy neighbor. Dean Corvus has secrets. None of which he wishes to share with OliviaBut when she finds out. She is thrust into a dark world, that a girl from a very sheltered upbringing has no idea how to handle. Who can save her from the darkness?
author: Shannon Alexander
